comments.creator: jmuizelaar@mozilla.com
comments.author: jmuizelaar@mozilla.com
comments.text: To make this work we'll need to add an 'intent' to all of the profile reading functions. We should then be able to decided at profile read time which tables we need to read and read only those. Part of this change will include not reading the tone reproduction curves if we have intent table.
comments.raw_text: To make this work we'll need to add an 'intent' to all of the profile reading functions. We should then be able to decided at profile read time which tables we need to read and read only those. Part of this change will include not reading the tone reproduction curves if we have intent table.
